meanings.sent1: The overdemanding teacher assigned three essays in one week.
meanings.sent2: She found the overdemanding workload overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The overdemanding toddler insisted on having five different toys at once.
meanings.sent4: His overdemanding expectations weighed heavily on his team.
meanings.sent5: The overdemanding customer demanded a refund for a perfectly fine product.

meanings.definition: Requiring too much effort or attention.
meanings.sent1: The overdemanding project left him exhausted and stressed.
meanings.sent2: Her overdemanding boss expected her to work overtime every day.
meanings.sent3: The overdemanding puzzle took hours to complete.
meanings.sent4: The overdemanding workout pushed her to her limits.
meanings.sent5: The overdemanding schedule left no time for relaxation.

meanings.definition: Expecting more than is reasonable or necessary.
meanings.sent1: His overdemanding request for a raise was denied by the company.
meanings.sent2: The overdemanding customer complained about minor imperfections.
meanings.sent3: The overdemanding cat refused to eat anything but fresh tuna.
meanings.sent4: Her overdemanding standards made it hard for her to find a partner.
meanings.sent5: The overdemanding deadline forced them to work through the night.
